Dayda

Department of Transportation

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the Department of Transportation (DOT), providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

About

    Vehicle Modifications for Persons with Disabilities - Modifier List

    Contain information that identifies, and provides contact information for, businesses modifying vehicles to enable persons with disabilities to operate the vehicle, or ride as a passenger.
